name: Alien Assault (Lee Kempton )
description:
My first attempt at a game in Unity, as part of a University coursework submission. While this game is not much I hope anyone who plays it enjoys it, I've learnt a lot from this project.

Alien Assault is a top down shooter with a levelling up mechanic, differing weapon and enemy types, with the aim to survive as long as possible. There is a money system which can be used to buy guns and ammo.

Hope you enjoy.
